abilities.description: Feeding Frenzy: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.8d90dd472856be27]{Resupply}, you may roll +iron instead of +wits. If you do, add +2 and suffer -1 supply on a hit.

Scent: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} using your hyena's senses to track your quarry or investigate a scene, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Mockery: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} in a fight by distracting your foe with your hyena's eerie laughter, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
